comments:
Show a figure using either the default renderer(s) or the renderer(s) specified by the renderer argument

Parameters ---------- fig: dict of Figure The Figure object or figure dict to display

renderer: str or None (default None) A string containing the names of one or more registered renderers (separated by '+' characters) or None.

If None, then the default renderers specified in plotly.io.renderers.default are used.

validate: bool (default True) True if the figure should be validated before being shown, False otherwise.
##### Returns
